summary:
Poland is a country in central Europe with a rich history. It is bordered by many countries, including Germany, Russia, and Ukraine. Poland has a diverse landscape, from mountains to the Baltic Sea. With over 38 million people, it is one of the most populous countries in the European Union.

The country has been inhabited since ancient times and became a powerful kingdom in the Middle Ages. It faced many challenges, including being divided by neighboring countries. Poland regained independence after World War I and played a significant role in defeating Nazi Germany in World War II. Today, it is a democratic country with a strong economy and a member of many international organizations.
title: Poland
